main event: Witnesses reported seeing a round, luminous white object moving over Kirksville, Missouri, on July 3, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as about the size of an automobile tire and appeared to be rotating or spinning., It was observed to rapidly accelerate and decelerate., The object hovered before moving in a complex flight pattern including a 90-degree turn., The sighting lasted approximately 2 to 3 minutes., The weather conditions were clear with unlimited visibility.
